ARABIC: فَٱصْدَعْ بِمَا تُؤْمَرُ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Proclaim what you have been ordered to and turn away from the idolaters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So declare to them what We have enjoined, and turn away from idolaters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Prophet), proclaim what you are commanded, and pay no heed to those who associate others with Allah in His Divinity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Preach what you have been commanded to and stay away from the pagans.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore publicly announce what you are commanded, and turn away from the polytheists.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Therefore openly proclaim what you have been commanded, and turn away from the idolators.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore declare openly what you are bidden and turn aside from the polytheists.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So shout that thou art commanded and turn thou away from the idolaters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So proclaim that which thou art commanded, and withdraw from the idolaters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Proclaim openly what you are commanded, and avoid the polytheists.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Promulgate thou that which thou art commanded, and turn away from the associaters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So proclaim what you have been commanded, and turn away from the polytheists.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Therefore expound openly what thou art commanded, and turn away from those who join false gods with Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Therefore proclaim openly (Allah's Message Islamic Monotheism) that which you are commanded, and turn away from Al-Mushrikun (polytheists, idolaters, and disbelievers, etc. - see V. 2:105).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Proclaim then, what you are commanded and turn away from the unbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So proclaim openly what you are commanded, and turn away from the polytheists.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:94] So proclaim, O Muhammad (s), what you have been commanded, to [proclaim], in other words, declare it openly and carry it out, and turn away from the idolaters — this was [revealed] before the command to struggle [against the idolaters].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So proclaim that which thou art commanded) He says: reveal your matter in Mecca, (and withdraw from the idolaters).
